title: Catering permits and temporary food facility licenses
dataVerified: Caterer name, event location, date, food service scope, health inspection
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake catering permits. Domain binding verifies health department. Event-specific authorization. Prevents foodborne illness liability. Public health protection.
